html:
6.21.22  8:21 pm   it seems like a ground plain would take longer to get where youre going but also be safer?

     that's right

      What other trade offs are there to taking a ground plane?

      stop to meet the locals

6.21.22  7:59 pm   i started playing piano because of your videos. do you take responsibility for my piano addiction?

      no

6.21.22  7:35 pm   Would you make a whole musical?

      sure

6.21.22  7:26 pm   when did you become a soap expert?

      never

6.21.22  7:04 pm   was born 2.18.2004 and tomorrow is 6.22.2022. am i crazy for thinking there's some significance

      no

6.21.22  6:46 pm   was the use of yellow and blue in if the world doesn't end a conscious decision?

      i usually use all the colors. except maybe this one

6.21.22  6:42 pm   "What do gamers think, what do they do" and onward is genuinely some of the best music you've ever made and that I've ever heard. Why do you suppose there's a correlation between a great result and quick easy writing? Because I think you said that was the easiest part of the song to write, the least obstacles. Maybe it's because it's unfiltered frustrationless expression? Maybe you're thinking the least?

      yes, that's right

6.21.22  6:41 pm   have you ever visited the land of the two letter words,

     yes

     and if so how was the weather

     like doing a puzzle

6.21.22  6:21 pm   Do you recommend eating blades of grass?

      no

6.21.22  6:11 pm   did you really just chroma key your greenscreen into a bluescreen?

      sometimes you gotta just get out there and live life

6.21.22  6:06 pm   can hamsters fly

      that would be almost too convenient

6.21.22  5:56 pm   love the new video. do you think that being a drummer has contributed to your animation skills?

     yes

     the animation just seems to flow so nicely and i love how it lands on the beat

      i am a stickler for that

6.21.22  5:54 pm   why does a ground plane need wings? it just makes the plane wider and harder to move on the ground

      i see where you're going with this

6.21.22  5:49 pm   is true happiness attainable, or are we all just attempting to fill the void with futility and despair

      it refers to the up direction of an updown wave. so in that sense, yes you can attain it, but not keep it. but it comes back, so if you analyze a broader time scale i suppose you can say you've kept it

6.21.22  5:43 pm   I guess everyone is wondering now: are you afraid of flying?

      no

6.21.22  5:42 pm   do you have a pet dog

      no

6.21.22  5:38 pm   What's something that keeps you busy?

      figuring things out

6.21.22  5:35 pm   how many times are we going to say the world will end

      you can keep saying it forever

6.21.22  5:32 pm   have you ever tried underground planes?

      no but that sounds like a strong idea

6.21.22  5:30 pm   Hi. I'm wondering if Ground Plane is the first time you've used "THE LICK" in one of your songs.

     no, it's in the 3rd verse of 'movie star' for sure, and it's also in many other places. on the 'jazz' page of this site i'm sure it's been used all the time. when i feel it coming on, i tend to just lay into it

     And don't be facetious Mr Wurtz, you know what "LICK" I mean!

Also, please don't ever stop being facetious.

6.21.22  5:30 pm   In the ground plane, at 2:02, did put in the lick, I swear I heard it you played it like 3 times and sang it once

      whether or not it is exactly the lick, it certainly thinks it's the lick and that is why it features itself with such confidence

6.21.22  5:30 pm   why is the ground plane on the ground?

      good starting place

6.21.22  5:27 pm   is the ground plane just a car

      just about

6.21.22  5:16 pm   what time is best for waking up

      4:44 am

6.21.22  5:15 pm   what was the question i asked again like a month ago?

      was it this one

6.21.22  5:15 pm   I've been trying to make songs, all the ones I want to create sound so great in my head but never feel right or quite as good after I record and mix. Any tips?

      just keep doing it. this gap will get smaller

6.21.22  5:12 pm   since you're a huge gamer most of the time, what are you during the times when you're not a gamer?

      i am somewhat of a gamer, all the time. at rare occasional moments i may be a huge gamer

6.21.22  5:10 pm   what do you think of chicago?

      ever had a slice of pizza shaped like a mattress

6.21.22  5:06 pm   what do you usually do at 10:21 pm?

      act naturally

6.21.22  4:54 pm   is your most recent song about trains

      sort of

6.21.22  4:52 pm   does a ground plane go under the ground or does it stay on the surface?

      the ground plane IS the ground

6.21.22  4:52 pm   are you on the ground plane

      yes i am

6.21.22  4:51 pm   ok so ground plane, great song good job
But I think that this is the first time that a jingle with lyrics(got my ticket) a and a song are in the same video
How did making that Feel

      good. i'm exploring my options

6.21.22  4:51 pm   What's your favorite noise?

      kong

6.21.22  4:50 pm   hello billiam, what is your favorite candle flavor?

      luke warm

6.21.22  4:49 pm   I noticed that in the ground plane video, the visual theme was a grid, or, I guess you could call it a plane. Was this intentional, or a coincidence? Because if you did it on purpose you are my new favorite genius

      it came along with the title, which i came up with 2 and a half years ago. i was aware of the possibility for double meaning

6.21.22  4:49 pm   your songs are like a train, its going one way but then you take a new satisfying turn. how do you do that?

      a long time ago i had the discovery that all roads lead somewhere. so then it becomes an interesting game sometimes to pick the unexpected ones, because they still go somewhere

6.21.22  4:47 pm   Have you seen top gun maverick?

     no

     If not what is your favorite monkey 

      regular monkey

6.21.22  4:44 pm   are you actually scared of planes

      no

6.21.22  4:43 pm   Why don't potatoes grow on trees?

      they're too heavy. the tree would fall over

6.21.22  4:31 pm   will we ever get a bill wurtz musical

      i don't see why not

6.21.22  4:29 pm   What gave you the idea for "the ground plane"? (If you respond, thanks! )

      someone asked me what the title of the next song would be, and i didn't know yet, so i made something up ('ground planes'). i also added it to the list because i thought it was ok

6.21.22  4:26 pm   In what year are ground planes coming to take over the world

      i don't see that happening

6.21.22  4:24 pm   you've packed your bags, what is in your bags?

      i have not packed my bags

6.21.22  4:23 pm   Do ground planes stay on the ground?

      yes, how did you know

6.21.22  4:15 pm   how do you get your piano sound effect in your songs so beautiful and pristine?

      sometimes it helps to EQ out some of the low range, especially if it's playing while other instruments are playing

6.21.22  4:11 pm   How do i acquire "main character energy"?

      just tell the truth

6.21.22  3:16 pm   is the meaning of a song determined by its creator or the listener?

      both

6.21.22  3:07 pm   Do you think in the future music could be used as an energy source? 

      it already is

6.21.22  2:29 pm   What on earth is the earth?

      i'm not sure
